mapper.select: select * from ( select insf.fid insfid,ins.fid insid,i.fid,i.fname,count(w.fid) total from tb_insframework i inner join tb_welding_machine w on w.finsframework_id=i.fid inner join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent inner join tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent group by i.fid )temp order by fid
